verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because he \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* into \w lime|strong="H7875"\w*:

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Kerioth|strong="H7152"\w*: and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* with \w tumult|strong="H7588"\w*, with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, \add and\add* with the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*:

And I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof, and will \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof with him, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they have \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H2706"\w*, and their \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* caused them to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the which their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*:

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* for \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* for a pair of \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*;

That \w pant|strong="H7602"\w* after the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* on the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, and turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w*: and a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* in unto the \add same\add* \w maid|strong="H5291"\w*, to \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:\f + \fr 2.7 \ft maid: or, young woman\f*

And they lay \add themselves\add* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* upon \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* laid to \w pledge|strong="H2254"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* every \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and they \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of the \w condemned|strong="H6064"\w* \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft the condemned: or, such as have fined, or, mulcted\f*

¶ Yet \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* I the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, whose \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \add was\add* like the \w height|strong="H1363"\w* of the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, and he \add was\add* \w strong|strong="H2634"\w* as the \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w*; yet I \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* his \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* from \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and his \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* from beneath.

Also I brought you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w led|strong="H3212"\w* you \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*.

And I raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* of your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* for \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and of your young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* for \w Nazarites|strong="H5139"\w*. \add Is it\add* not even thus, O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But ye gave the \w Nazarites|strong="H5139"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*; and \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* not.

Behold, I am \w pressed|strong="H5781"\w* under you, as a \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* is \w pressed|strong="H5781"\w* \add that is\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w sheaves|strong="H5995"\w*.\f + \fr 2.13 \ft I am…: or, I will press your place, as a cart full of sheaves presseth\f*

Therefore the \w flight|strong="H4498"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w swift|strong="H7031"\w*, and the \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* shall not \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* his \w force|strong="H3581"\w*, neither shall the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*:\f + \fr 2.14 \ft himself: Heb. his soul, or, life\f*

Neither shall he \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* that \w handleth|strong="H8610"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*; and \add he that is\add* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* of \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* shall not \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \add himself:\add* neither shall he that \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*.

And \add he that is\add* \w courageous|strong="H0533"\w* among the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* shall flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft courageous: Heb. strong of his heart\f*
